item.title: Welcome to Zurich! Information for Czech and Slovak newcomers!
item.description:
Na t√©to str√°nce najdete v≈°echny pot≈ôebn√© informace ohlednƒõ ubytov√°n√≠, bankovnictv√≠, poji≈°tƒõn√≠, SIM karet a ve≈ôejn√© dopravy v Curychu. Pokud m√°te jak√©koliv dotazy, nev√°hejte n√°s kontaktovat. Informace na t√©to str√°nce maj√≠ tendenci se rychle mƒõnit. Pokud naleznete nep≈ôesn√© nebo nekompletn√≠ informace, dejte n√°m vƒõdƒõt na info@cssz.ch.

Ubytov√°n√≠

Sehnat ubytov√°n√≠ v Curychu m≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt velmi slo≈æit√©, vypl√°c√≠ se proto zaƒç√≠t vƒças, ide√°lnƒõ aspo≈à 2-4 mƒõs√≠ce p≈ôed zaƒç√°tkem studia, proto≈æe pot√°vka po studentsk√©m bydlen√≠ je extr√©mnƒõ vysok√°. Studenti ETH/UZH bydl√≠ p≈ôev√°≈ænƒõ ve sd√≠len√Ωch bytech (WG). Nejpopul√°rnƒõj≈°√≠ webov√© str√°nky pro hled√°n√≠ ubytov√°n√≠ jsou:

  • WOKO je nejobl√≠benƒõj≈°√≠m poskytovatelem studentsk√©ho ubytov√°n√≠ v Curychu a organizace nab√≠zej√≠c√≠ nƒõkter√© z nejdostupnƒõj≈°√≠ch mo≈ænost√≠ studentsk√©ho bydlen√≠, vƒçetnƒõ jednol≈Ø≈ækov√Ωch pokoj≈Ø, sd√≠len√Ωch byt≈Ø a studi√≠. Chcete-li si pronajmout pokoj od WOKO nebo Juwo, mus√≠te b√Ωt zaps√°ni na univerzitƒõ v Curychu a mlad≈°√≠ 28 let, bƒõ≈ænƒõ oznaƒçovan√© jako krit√©ria Woko.
  • Juwo (Jugendwohnnetz) je organizace poskytuj√≠c√≠ dostupn√© mo≈ænosti bydlen√≠ pro studenty ve vƒõku 16 ‚Äì 25 let a nab√≠z√≠ ≈ôadu r≈Øzn√Ωch mo≈ænost√≠ bydlen√≠, vƒçetnƒõ byt≈Ø, sd√≠len√Ωch byt≈Ø a spoleƒçn√Ωch bydlen√≠. Plat√≠ stejn√° krit√©ria jako u WOKO.
  • WG Zimmer je port√°l na hled√°n√≠ sd√≠len√©ho bydlen√≠.
  • Flatfox je dal≈°√≠ alternativa k WG Zimmer.

Pro studenty ETH existuje mo≈ænost pokusit se sehnat pokoj na kampusu H√∂ngerrberg ve Student Village nebo Living Science. Nejvƒõt≈°√≠ ≈°ance je sledovat spoleƒçnou Facebookovou skupinu obou objekt≈Ø, kde st√°vaj√≠c√≠ studenti nab√≠zej√≠ voln√© pokoje.

Pomoct um√≠ obƒças i Housing Office ETH/UZH, kter√° poskytuje vyhled√°vac√≠ port√°l a nƒõkdy i p≈ôidƒõluje byty / pokoje zahraniƒçn√≠m student≈Øm, doktorand≈Øm, profesor≈Øm a akademick√Ωm host≈Øm ETH/UZH.

Povolen√≠ k pobytu

Ani ƒåe≈°i ani Slov√°ci v√≠zum k pobytu ve ≈†v√Ωcarsku nepot≈ôebuj√≠. V≈°ichni ov≈°em potrebuj√≠ povolen√≠ k pobytu (Residence Permit / Aufenthaltsbewilligung). O povolen√≠ k pobytu je nutn√© za≈æ√°dat do 14 dn≈Ø od p≈ô√≠jezdu do ≈†v√Ωcarska na √∫≈ôadƒõ pro hl√°≈°en√≠ obyvatel (Personenmeldeamt Z√ºrich). O term√≠n je mo≈æno za≈æ√°dat na tomto odkaze. S sebou si vezmƒõte:

  • pas nebo obƒçanku
  • roz≈°√≠≈ôen√© potvrzen√≠ o studiu (dostupn√© v port√°lu mystudies.ethz.ch)
  • n√°jemn√≠ smlouvu (potvrzen√≠ o bydlen√≠)
  • 110 CHF (70 CHF za povolen√≠ k pobytu a 40 CHF za registraci)
  • d≈Økaz o dostateƒçn√Ωch finanƒçn√≠ch prost≈ôedc√≠ch, co≈æ je buƒè:
    • dopis od rodiƒç≈Ø, ve kter√©m potrvzuj√≠, ≈æe jste jejich d√≠tƒõ a ≈æe v√°s budou finanƒçnƒõ podporovat ƒç√°stkou 1.750 CHF mƒõs√≠ƒçnƒõ, a nebo
    • bankovn√≠ v√Ωpis se z≈Østatkem aspo≈à 21.000 CHF

Po tomto term√≠nu budete posl√°n√≠ na migraƒçn√≠ √∫≈ôad (Migrationsamt Z√ºrich), kde v√°m budou odebr√°ny biometrick√© √∫daje. Povolen√≠ k pobytu je kartiƒçka, kterou dostane p√°r t√Ωdn≈Ø po tomto term√≠nu. Povolen√≠ k pobytu je nutn√© obnovit ka≈æd√Ω rok.

Bankovn√≠ √∫ƒçet

Snad v≈°echny banky nab√≠z√≠ v√Ωhodn√© podm√≠nky pro studenty. Zde je p≈ôehled hlavn√≠ch bank a jejich nab√≠dky studentsk√Ωch √∫ƒçt≈Ø: Credit Suisse, UBS, Z√ºrcher Kantonalbank (ZKB), PostFinance. Mezi dal≈°√≠ mo≈ænosti pat≈ô√≠ i digit√°ln√≠ banky jako nap≈ô√≠klad Neon. K otev≈ôen√≠ bankovn√≠ho √∫ƒçtu ve ≈†v√Ωcarsku studenti obvykle pot≈ôebuj√≠ platn√© povolen√≠ k pobytu, doklad toto≈ænosti a studentsk√Ω pr≈Økaz.

  • Credit Suisse Young
  • UBS key4 Students
  • Z√ºrcher Kantonalbank (ZKB) for Students
  • PostFinance
  • Neon

N√°klady na studium

N√°sleduj√≠c√≠ tabulka shrnuje ofici√°ln√≠ odhad n√°klad≈Ø na studium pro mezin√°rodn√≠ studenty na ETH. Rozd√≠l na UZH je minim√°ln√≠. Jedn√° se o orientaƒçn√≠ ƒç√≠sla (sp√≠≈°e p≈ôest≈ôelen√°), kter√° se mohou li≈°it podle konkr√©tn√≠ch pot≈ôeb a ≈æivotn√≠ho stylu studenta.

Category Cost per Month (CHF) Cost per Year (CHF)
Compulsory Study Costs (per semester)
Tuition fee (including exam fees) - 730
ASVZ + Scholarship Fund + VSETH - 74
Total Compulsory Study Costs (per semester) 804
Living Costs Estimate
Rent (room incl. heating, etc.) 944 11,300
Meals (including cafeteria) 600 7,200
Public transport (tramways, bus > Zurich City) ~49 ~586
Health insurance (informace o poji≈°tƒõn√≠ n√≠≈æe) ~150
Individual expenses 200 2400
Total Study and Living Costs ~1,870 ~22,440

V√≠ce informac√≠ o finanƒçn√≠ n√°roƒçnosti studia, ale i mo≈æn√Ωch zp≈Øsobech financov√°n√≠ na UZH zde a ETH zde.

ETH Stipendium

ETH Zurich nab√≠z√≠ stipendia zahraniƒçn√≠m student≈Øm jako sekund√°rn√≠ zdroj finanƒçn√≠ pomoci. Tato stipendia jsou urƒçena k doplnƒõn√≠ dal≈°√≠ch zdroj≈Ø financov√°n√≠, jako jsou stipendia z domovsk√© zemƒõ studenta, a nepokr√Ωvaj√≠ pln√© n√°klady na ≈æivot a studium v ‚Äã‚ÄãCurychu.

Krit√©ria zp≈Øsobilosti

  • Studenti bakal√°≈ôsk√©ho studia: Ne≈°v√Ωcar≈°t√≠ studenti BSc jsou zp≈Øsobil√≠ po √∫spƒõ≈°n√©m slo≈æen√≠ v≈°ech ƒç√°st√≠ zkou≈°ek z prvn√≠ho roƒçn√≠ku (Basisjahr).
  • Magister≈°t√≠ studenti: Ne≈°v√Ωcar≈°t√≠ studenti magistersk√©ho studia, kte≈ô√≠ nemaj√≠ bakal√°≈ôsk√Ω titul ETH Zurich, jsou zp≈Øsobil√≠ po dokonƒçen√≠ alespo≈à 40 kredit≈Ø v p≈ôedchoz√≠m roce magistersk√©ho studia.
  • Stipendia se udƒõluj√≠ do konce ≈ô√°dn√© doby studia plus dal≈°√≠ dva semestry.

Proces ≈æ√°dosti

  • Term√≠n p≈ôihl√°≈°ek pro akademick√Ω rok 2024/25 je od 1. z√°≈ô√≠ do 31. ≈ô√≠jna 2024.
  • P≈ôihl√°≈°ky je nutn√© podat elektronicky p≈ôes port√°l eStip, kam je pot≈ôeba nahr√°t v≈°echny pot≈ôebn√© dokumenty ve form√°tu PDF.

Dal≈°√≠ podrobnosti najdete na webov√© str√°nce finanƒçn√≠ pomoci ETH Zurich.

Poji≈°tƒõn√≠

Studenti ze zem√≠ EU s ‚ÄûEvropsk√Ωm pr≈Økazem zdravotn√≠ho poji≈°tƒõn√≠‚Äú (EHIC) mohou ve ≈†v√Ωcarsku po≈æ√°dat o v√Ωjimku z jinak povinn√©ho zdravotn√≠ho poji≈°tƒõn√≠. O tuto v√Ωjimku je t≈ôeba po≈æ√°dat do do t≈ô√≠ mƒõs√≠c≈Ø po p≈ô√≠jezdu do ≈†v√Ωcarska. K vyplnƒõn√≠ ≈æ√°dosti budete pot≈ôebovat digit√°ln√≠ kopie n√°sleduj√≠c√≠ch dokument≈Ø:

  1. Povolen√≠ k pobytu: Naskenujte p≈ôedn√≠ i zadn√≠ stranu. Pokud toto povolen√≠ je≈°tƒõ nem√°te, poskytnƒõte potvrzen√≠ o registraci (‚ÄûMeldebest√§tigung‚Äú).
  2. Evropsk√° karta zdravotn√≠ho poji≈°tƒõn√≠.
  3. Potvrzen√≠ o z√°pisu ke studiu: To slou≈æ√≠ jako d≈Økaz o va≈°em z√°pisu na ETH Zurich.

Po shrom√°≈ædƒõn√≠ tƒõchto dokument≈Ø vypl≈àte online formul√°≈ô SVA Zurich.

D≈Øle≈æit√° pozn√°mka: Osvobozen√≠ je platn√© pouze v p≈ô√≠padƒõ, ≈æe nem√°te ≈æ√°dn√Ω p≈ô√≠jem. Pokud zaƒçnete pob√≠rat plat, bez ohledu na jeho v√Ω≈°i, budete muset z√≠skat zdravotn√≠ poji≈°tƒõn√≠ ‚Äì buƒè studentsk√Ω bal√≠ƒçek poji≈°tƒõn√≠ (jako studenti mimo EU), nebo ≈°v√Ωcarsk√© poji≈°tƒõn√≠ KVG.

  • v√≠ce informac√≠ zde

SIM karta

N√≠≈æe nab√≠z√≠me seznam popul√°rn√≠ch mobiln√≠ch oper√°tor≈Ø a odkaz na jejich nab√≠dky. Konkr√©tn√≠ nab√≠dky se ƒçasto mƒõn√≠, proto doporuƒçujeme nav≈°t√≠vit webov√© str√°nky oper√°tor≈Ø pro aktu√°ln√≠ informace.

Nejpopul√°rnƒõj≈°√≠:

  • Swisscom
  • Salt
  • Sunrise
  • Yallo
  • Swype

Ostatn√≠:

  • M-Budget
  • Coop Mobile
  • Lebara
  • Lycamobile
  • Wingo
  • Aldi Suisse
  • TalkTalk
  • Lidl Connect

Ve≈ôejn√° doprava

ZVV (Z√ºrcher Verkehrsverbund) je spoleƒçnost, kter√° spravuje ve≈ôejnou dopravu v kantonu Curych. ZVV nab√≠z√≠ mƒõs√≠ƒçn√≠ a roƒçn√≠ p≈ôedplatn√©. Kompletn√≠ informace o cen√°ch a typech p≈ôedplatn√©ho najdete na webov√Ωch str√°nk√°ch ZVV. Zde je shrnut√≠ pro studenty do 25 let.

Typ p≈ôedpl√°tn√©ho Doba platnosti Cena
1‚Äì2 zones 1 month 63.00 CHF
1‚Äì2 zones 1 year 586.00 CHF

ƒåasto vyu≈æ√≠van√© alternativy:

  • Night GA Travelcard: Pro ty, kte≈ô√≠ cestuj√≠ p≈ôedev≈°√≠m ve veƒçern√≠ch hodin√°ch, je Night GA Travelcard skvƒõlou volbou. Nab√≠z√≠ neomezen√© cestov√°n√≠ v≈°emi druhy dopravy v r√°mci s√≠tƒõ ZVV po 19:00 a plat√≠ nap≈ô√≠ƒç v≈°emi tarifn√≠mi z√≥nami ZVV za 99 CHF roƒçnƒõ.
  • Half Fare Travelcard (Halbtax): Tato cestovn√≠ karta v√°m umo≈æn√≠ u≈æ√≠t si cestov√°n√≠ po ≈†v√Ωcarsku za poloviƒçn√≠ cenu za 190 CHF roƒçnƒõ. Poƒç√≠naje druh√Ωm rokem m≈Ø≈æete u≈°et≈ôit dal≈°√≠ch 20 CHF, kdy≈æ si obnov√≠te cestovn√≠ kartu s poloviƒçn√≠m tarifem.

item.title: Welcome to Autumn 2024. üçÇ And join our team! ü§ù
item.description:
Hey all,

We wish you a great start to the new semester! We have a lot of exciting events planned for you this semester. We would be delighted if you joined us at any of them. More details are coming later at the beginning of the semester. You can find a rough outline below. Make sure to sign up for our newsletter to stay in the loop.

This year the AGM will take place online on September 13. We will be electing the new board and organizing team. If you want to participate, sign up here. Shortly after, we will also publish the specific planned events for the next semester.

And if you‚Äôre interested in joining our team, we‚Äôd love to hear from you - more below!

Events

We‚Äôre kicking things off with a Welcome Event at a cool local spot ‚Äì great chance to meet everyone. Then, we‚Äôll head outdoors for a Hike to enjoy some fresh air and good views. Mid-October, we‚Äôll get together for a laid-back Meet ‚Äòn‚Äô Dine. In November, there‚Äôs another hangout over food at Mensa UZH. As winter hits, we plan to organize a Ski Day Trip in December, and later in February, there‚Äôs a bigger Ski Trip to close out the season. Can’t wait to see you there.

If you want to know about all the planned events, be sure to subscribe to our calendar. Also, keep an eye on our instagram where we will keep you up to date with the latest news. We hope to see you at some of the events!

Subscribe to our events in Google Calendar

Looking for new team members

We are looking for new team members to help us organize events and manage the association. We‚Äôre looking for new board members, event organisers, and volunteers. Get in touch with us if you‚Äôre keen to help out. On September 13, the Annual General Assembly will take place, at which the new Board and organizational team for the year 2024/2025 will be elected.

Open positions include:

  • Board member – responsible for the overall management of the association (finances, semester planning, venue booking, recruiting new members, etc.)
  • Event organiser – responsible for planning and executing events (pub quizzes, bQm meetups, hikes, dinners, etc. – your creativity is the limit)
  • Volunteer – forget about the responsibilities and just help us out at specific events

If you are interested in directly participating in the running of the association and being part of the Board / Organizing committee, please apply by September 12th using the mail link below.

In case of any questions, contact us at info@cssz.ch

Get in touch

item.title: Welcome to the Spring semester of 2024!
item.description:
Dear members,

We would like to wish you all a good start and much strength for the new semester! We would also like to share our plans for events and meetings during this semester ‚Äì we would be delighted if you could join us at any of them. The very second week of term (Thu 27 Feb) we’ll be meeting in the bQm bar ‚Äì come along for a pint, a chat and to meet new and existing students.

Apart from the traditional events, we are planning one new thing this year. Together with ESN Zurich we will be hosting a big Liquor Tasting at the end of April. If you are planning a trip to the Czech Republic/Slovakia and bring some traditional alcohol to the Liquor Tasting, you will get free entry (details on the website).

Other planned events can be found below. If you want to know about all the planned events, be sure to subscribe to our calendar. Also, keep an eye on our instagram where we will keep you up to date with the latest news. We hope to see you at some of the events!

Subscribe to our events in Google Calendar

item.title: Welcome to the Autumn semester of 2023!
item.description: Welcome to the Autumn semester of 2023! We are looking forward to meeting you at our events. See the list of events planned for the semester below.

item.title: 3rd Slovak and Czech Annual Symposium 2023 by CometX
item.description:
3rd Slovak and Czech Annual Symposium 2023

Dear members, we would like to invite you to 3rd CometX Slovak and Czech Annual Symposium.

The biggest networking event for Slovaks and Czechs in Switzerland. Semi-formal one-day conference bringing together students, expats, and professionals and companies in Switzerland is finally back! Meet again with more than 150 expats, make friends and find new connections.

Register Now

Time & Location

Sep 15, 8:00 AM ‚Äì 9:00 PM

H√∂nggerberg Campus, Vladimir-Prelog-Weg 10, 8049 Z√ºrich, Switzerland

About the event

The¬†biggest networking event¬†for Slovaks and Czechs in Switzerland. Semi-formal one-day conference bringing together students, expats, and professionals and companies in Switzerland is finally back! Meet again with more than¬†150¬†expats, make friends and find new connections.

Buy your ticket today and¬†register¬†for talk, poster, or networking table on this page!

Types of tickets

Student Ticket - Enjoy discounted entry by presenting a valid student ID.

Adult Ticket - This is a standard admission ticket for all non-student attendees, company representatives, and other visitors

VIP Supporter Ticket

By purchasing this ticket, you support CometX’s activities and become a VIP member. Enjoy exclusive benefits and recognition during the conference and on our website as a valued partner.

item.title: Looking for a room? Or looking for a flatmate?
item.description:
üè† Looking for a room?
üë´ Or looking for an awesome flatmate from the Czech and Slovak community?

üìß Look no further, we got you covered using our new room-seekers@cssz.ch mailing list. ü•≥

Looking for a room

Join the group to receive emails for any potential offers. You can always leave or manage your membership through Google Groups. When responding to an offer, make sure you read the listing in detail – unrelated responses are a huge factor for a low response rate.

Of course, make sure to also use other ways to look for a room, such as WG Zimmer or Woko.

Looking for a flatmate

Email the group with anything you’ve got, you don’t need to join the group youself. The best is if you have a link to your already existing ad (such as on WG Zimmer) that has more information about the room (address, size, price, pictures, description of flatmates, and so on).

You will hear back if any of the candidates are interested.

Frequently Asked Questions

See the questions below or contact us if you have a new question.

What are some other popular websites for finding student rooms in Zurich?
The most popular is WG Zimmer, but check out also WOKO, Juwo and Flatfox.
What is WOKO / Juwo?
WOKO is the most popular provider of student accommodation in Zurich. A non-profit organisation offerinf some of the most affordable student housing options, including single rooms, shared apartments, and studios.

Similarly, Juwo (short for Jugendwohnnetz) is a non-profit providing affordable housing options for students of age 16 – 25, offering a range of different housing options, including apartments, shared flats, and communal living arrangements.

To rent a room from WOKO or Juwo, you must be enrolled in a university in Zurich and under 28, commonly referred to as the Woko criteria.

When should I start looking for a room?
It is recommended to start looking for a student room in Zurich at least 2-3 months in advance, as the demand for student housing is extremely high. Even 4-6 months in advance is not too early.
Can international students rent student rooms in Zurich?
Of course. If you’re subletting from Woko, you’ll need to provide additional documentation such as proof of enrollment in a university in Zurich.

item.title: Unimak: Webinar on studying in German-speaking countries
item.description:
For prospective students:

Do countries like Switzerland, Germany and Austria sound interesting to you? üá©üá™üá¶üáπüá®üá≠ Are you considering studying in German and would you like to learn more about the top schools in these countries? üìö

Then join us on 02.05. at 19:00 CET for a webinar organised by Unimak where you can have all your questions about studying abroad answered! üåç Specifically, Juraj Miƒçko (juraj.micko@cssz.ch) will talk about studying in Zurich. You will find out how the admission process works, how to deal with finances, but also what a normal day looks like for such a student. ‚ú®

Registration form

item.title: Meeting with the Slovak president
item.description:
On 20 May 2022, the Board of CSSZ was delighted to meet the President of Slovakia, H.E. Zuzana ƒåaputov√°. She visited ETH Zurich as part of her three-day visit to Switzerland. Hosted by the H.E. Ignazio Cassis, President of the Swiss Confederation, she was introduced to the co-working space Student Project House and a few specific projects. One of the presenters was also Mat√∫≈° ≈Ωilinec (matus.zilinec@cssz.ch).

After the visit, the delegation went to the famous Polyterrasse in front of the main building of ETH, where students from Slovakia and the Czech Republic exchanged a few words directly with the President ƒåaputov√°. We talked about studying at ETH and the CSSZ association. The President was grateful for the meeting, and she appreciated our initiative.

The following people are in the front row in the header picture (from the left): Radim Urban, H.E. Zuzana ƒåaputov√° (the President of Slovakia), Pavol Drot√°r, Juraj Miƒçko.

Thank you to the President for a very nice meeting!

item.title: Hello and Welcome to CSSZ!üá®üáøüá∏üá∞
item.description:
Hello and Welcome!

Welcome to the official webpage of Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich!

Stay tuned as we will post soon about what we have planned for you!
